meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive James Dew Danielle Yermish Steve Mandella Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4005.

div.div: (Sarah: Hi, I'm Sarah. Today on Jeopardy! the Clue Crew is going to a yard sale. Come on along.)

td.p: James Dew, an animal trainer from Valencia, California
Danielle Yermish, an elementary school teacher from Los Angeles, California
Steve Mandella, an assistant security manager originally from North Huntington, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,200)

tr.td: U.S. STATES
LITERARY CROSSWORDS CLUES "T"
WEIGHTS & MEASURES
POLITICAL ETYMOLOGY
YARD SALE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Because he was not well enough known, Gene Hackman lost the role of Mike Brady to this actor')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Because he was not well enough known, Gene Hackman lost the role of Mike Brady to this actor

Massachusetts

Jan

Danielle
')
